directions: With a mortar and pestle or in an electric coffee/spice grinder grind coriander seeds. Mince garlic and mash to paste with salt. In a bowl stir together coriander, garlic paste, and oil and rub onto chops.
Arrange chops on rack of a broiler pan and broil 3 inches from heat 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare.
title: Coriander Lamb Chops
